# Science podcast

En podd från American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) som sammanfattar intressanta vetenskapsnyheter från olika fält, ibland med intervjuer av forskare som ligger bakom nya rön.

Länk: <http://www.sciencemag.org/podcasts>

Intressanta avsnitt: 

- [Building conscious machines](http://www.sciencemag.org/podcast/building-conscious-machines-tracing-asteroid-origins-and-how-world-s-oldest-forests-grew)

- [Following 1000 people for decades to learn about the interplay of health, environment, and temperament](http://www.sciencemag.org/podcast/following-1000-people-decades-learn-about-interplay-health-environment-and-temperament-and)
